DOC.brief_summary: This open-label study evaluate pharmacokinetics simvastatin coadministered albiglutide healthy adult subject . The primary objective ass effect albiglutide dose pharmacokinetics simvastatin .
DOC.brief_title: A Drug Interaction Study Simvastatin Albiglutide
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase I open-label study evaluate pharmacokinetics simvastatin coadministered albiglutide healthy adult subject . The primary objective ass effect albiglutide dose pharmacokinetics simvastatin .
